document_data.name: The Dutiful Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dutiful Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Dutiful''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: The Dutiful represented the largest and most powerful mamluk organization in the entire Land of Fate. Despite this, they were bitter rivals with the [[Respected Mamluk Society|Respected]], who dominated the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]] north of [[Qudra]].
document_data.Organization: The Dutiful were led by the [[dwarf|dwarven]] Emir [[Hatit Abd al-Wajib]].
document_data.Base of Operations: This large organizations had a presence in most cities in Zakhara, but most of their power was centered in Qudra, [[Huzuz]], and [[Utaqa]].
